WYSIWYM.model
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Node
All Implemented Interfaces:
TreeComponent
Direct Known Subclasses:
DTNode, SGNode
public abstract class Node
extends Object
implements TreeComponent

Node is an interface for tree nodes

Version:
1.1 20-10-2006
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

addIncomingEdge

public void addIncomingEdge(Edge edge)
                     throws NameAlreadyBoundException
Add an incoming edge to the node. If the node is already present, throw an exception If possible, use the id as key, otherwise the label

Parameters:
edge - Incoming edge
Throws:
NameAlreadyBoundException - if the edge already is an incoming edge

getSimilarEdges

public List<Edge> getSimilarEdges(Edge e,
                                  String inverse)
Returns all edges of the same property in the same direction, and the inverse property in the other direction. For instance, if e is an outgoing edge labeled 'hasAuthor', this will return all outgoing edges labeled 'hasAuthor' and all incoming edges labeled 'authorOf'.

Parameters:
e - Original Edge
inverse - Name of inverse property, null if there is no inverse.
Returns:
List Similar edges

getSimilarEdges

public List<Edge> getSimilarEdges(Edge e,
                                  List<String> properties,
                                  OntologyReader reader)
Returns all edges of the same properties in the same direction, and the inverse property in the other direction. If two edges have the same source and target, only one is returned, as to do other would result in multiple lexicalisations of the same statement!

Parameters:
e - Original edge
properties - List with property names
reader - Ontology
Returns:
List with similar edges
